response.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
response.name: The input name
response.score: Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.
response.region: Most likely region (based on country ISO2 code)
response.topRegion: Most likely top region (based on country ISO2 code)
response.subRegion: Most likely sub region (based on country ISO2 code)
response.probabilityCalibrated: The calibrated probability for country to have been guessed correctly.
response.probabilityAltCalibrated: The calibrated probability for country OR countryAlt to have been guessed correctly

/api2/json/country/{personalNameFull}.summary: Infer the likely country of residence of a personal full name, or one surname. Assumes names as they are in the country of residence OR the country of origin

request.properNoun: The name of a person, a brand or object that is spelled with a capital letter

response.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
response.name: The name, as it was given for analysis
response.commonType: The type of the analyzed name
response.commonTypeAlt: The alternative  type of the analyzed name
response.score: The coefficient of accuracy of the result

/api2/json/nameType/{properNoun}.summary: Detect if a proper noun is a personal name or a public name

request.source: The API Key to set as enabled/disabled
request.disabled: Should the API key be set to disabled

request.firstName: The personal name given to someone at birth, or baptism

response.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
response.firstName: The first name, as it was given for analysis
response.lastName: The last name, as it was given for analysis
response.countryOrigin: The code of the country of origin, in ISO 2 format
response.countryOriginAlt: The code of the alternative country of origin, in ISO 2 format
response.countriesOriginTop: The codes of the 10 most likely countries of origin, in ISO 2 format
response.score: The coefficient of accuracy of the result
response.topRegionOrigin: Most likely top region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)
response.probabilityCalibrated: The calibrated probability for countryOrigin to have been guessed correctly.
response.probabilityAltCalibrated: The alternative probability of the result, on a scale from 0 to 1

/api2/json/origin/{firstName}/{lastName}.summary: Detect the likely country of origin of a first name and last name structure. For countries like U.S.A, Canada, Australia or New-Zealand and other melting-pots, refer to 'diaspora'

response.softwareNameAndVersion: The name of the API version
response.softwareVersion: An array of the major, minor and patch version

/api2/json/softwareVersion.summary: Get the current version of the Namsor software

softwareVersion.softwareNameAndVersion: The name of the API version
softwareVersion.softwareVersion: An array of the major, minor and patch version

classifiers.serving: True if the classifier is serving requests (has reached minimal learning, is not shutting down)
classifiers.learning: True if the classifier is learning
classifiers.shuttingDown: True if the classifier is shutting down
classifiers.probabilityCalibrated: True if the classifier has finished the initial learning and calibrated probabilities (meanwhile, during initial learning, probabilities will be equal to -1)

/api2/json/apiStatus.summary: Prints the current status of the classifiers. A classifier name in apiStatus corresponds to a service name in apiServices.

response.serviceName: A service name corresponds to classifier name in apiStatus (ex. personalname_gender or personalfullname_gender)
response.serviceGroup: Groups together classifiers providing a similar service (ex. gender groups personalname_gender and personalfullname_gender)
response.costInUnits: The cost in units for the usage of that service

/api2/json/apiServices.summary: Receive a list of the API services and usage costs in Units

response.classifierName: Name of the classifier as per apiStatus (corresponds also to the name of the service in apiServices)
response.taxonomyClasses: The taxonomy classes this classifier classifies to

/api2/json/taxonomyClasses/{classifierNa.summary: Print the taxonomy classes valid for the given classifier.

subscription.apiKey: Your Namsor API key. Always keep it secret
subscription.planStarted: The starting date of the plan, in UNIX format
subscription.priorPlanStarted: Datetime when the user subscribed to the prior plan
subscription.planEnded: The ending date of the plan, in UNIX format
subscription.taxRate: Applicable tax rate for the plan
subscription.planBaseFeesKey: Current plan key (as in Stripe product)
subscription.planQuota: The total number of units associated with this plan
subscription.priceOverageUSD: The overage price in U.S. dollars ($)
subscription.price: The price in the user's preferred currency
subscription.priceOverage: The overaged price in the user's preferred currency
subscription.currencyFactor: For USD, GBP, EUR - the factor is 1

billingPeriod.apiKey: Your Namsor API key. Always keep it secret
billingPeriod.subscriptionStarted: The subscription starting date, in UNIX format
billingPeriod.periodStarted: The subscription starting date, in UNIX format
billingPeriod.periodEnded: The subscription ending date, in UNIX format
billingPeriod.stripeCurrentPeriodEnd: Datetime when the the plan's current period endend (in Stripe). Internal and Stripe periodicity should ~coincide
billingPeriod.stripeCurrentPeriodStart: Datetime when the the plan's current period started (in Stripe). Internal and Stripe periodicity should ~coincide
billingPeriod.billingStatus: Current period billing status ex OPEN
billingPeriod.usage: The number of units used so far
billingPeriod.softLimit: Current period soft limit (reaching the limit sends an email notification)
billingPeriod.hardLimit: Current period hard limit (reaching the limit sends an email notification and blocks the API Key)

response.overageQuantity: Quantity above monthly quota of the current subscritpion, in units

/api2/json/apiUsage.summary: Receive information on your subscription plan and current API usage

apiKey.apiKey: Your Namsor API key. Always keep it secret
apiKey.admin: The API Key has admin role
apiKey.vetted: The API Key is vetted (assumed truthful) for machine learning
apiKey.learnable: The API Key is learnable (without assuming truthfulness) for machine learning. Set learnable=false and anonymized=true for highest privacy (ie. to forget data as it's processed)
apiKey.anonymized: The API Key is anonymized (using SHA-252 digest for logging). Set learnable=false and anonymized=true for highest privacy (ie. to forget data as it's processed)
apiKey.partner: The API Key has partner role
apiKey.striped: The API Key is associated to a valid Stripe account
apiKey.corporate: The API Key has role corporate (ex SWIFT payments instead of Stripe payments)
apiKey.disabled: The API Key is temporarily or permanently disabled

response.apiService: The type of service that was requested for the analysis of names
response.createdDateTime: The date of the analysis, in UNIX format
response.totalUsage: The total cost of the analysis in units
response.lastFlushedDateTime: The flush datetime of the counter
response.lastUsedDateTime: The last usage datetime of the counter
response.serviceFeaturesUsage: Usage of special features, such as Chinese, Japanese

response.timeUnit: Time unit is DAY, WEEK or MONTH depending on prior usage
response.periodStart: Start datetime of the reporting period
response.periodEnd: End datetime of the reporting period
response.totalUsage: Total usage in the current period
response.historyTruncated: If the history was truncaded due to data limit
response.data: Data points : usage per DAY, WEEK or MONTH and per apiService

/api2/json/apiUsageHistoryAggregate.summary: Print your API usage history in an aggregated view (by service, by day/hour/min)

request.countryIso2From: The ISO country code from which the interaction starts
request.firstNameFrom: The first name of the person from whom the interaction starts
request.lastNameFrom: The last name of the person from whom the interaction starts
request.countryIso2To: The ISO country code to which the interaction goes
request.firstNameTo: The first name of the person to whom the interaction goes
request.lastNameTo: The last name of the person to whom the interaction goes

FirstLastNameGenderedOut.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
FirstLastNameGenderedOut.firstName: The first name (also known as given name)
FirstLastNameGenderedOut.lastName: The last name (also known as family name, or surname)
FirstLastNameGenderedOut.genderScale: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Gender Scale M[-1..U..+1]F value
FirstLastNameGenderedOut.score: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Gender score value. Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.
FirstLastNameGenderedOut.probabilityCalibrated: The calibrated probability for inferred gender to have been guessed correctly.

FirstLastNameOriginedOut.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.firstName: The first name (also known as given name)
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.lastName: The last name (also known as family name, or surname)
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.countryOriginAlt: Second best alternative : country of Origin
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.score: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Origin score value. Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.regionOrigin: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.topRegionOrigin: Most likely top region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.subRegionOrigin: Most likely sub region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.probabilityCalibrated: The calibrated probability for countryOrigin to have been guessed correctly.
FirstLastNameOriginedOut.probabilityAltCalibrated: The calibrated probability for countryOrigin OR countryOriginAlt to have been guessed correctly

FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.script: The alphabet or characters used in the parameters
FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.firstName: The first name (also known as given name)
FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.lastName: The last name (also known as family name, or surname)
FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.score: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Diaspora score value. Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.
FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.lifted: Indicates if the output ethnicity is based on machine learning only, or further lifted as a known fact by a country-specific rule. Let us know if you believe ethnicity is incorrect on a specific case where lifted is true
FirstLastNameDiasporaedOut.countryIso2: From input data, the countryIso2 of geographic context (US,CA etc.)
